actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax credit and deduction for purchase by the taxpayer of a catalytic converter a part of a new 1975 model light duty vehicle.

summary.text: Allows an income tax credit and deduction for the purchase by the taxpayer of a catalytic converter as part of a new 1975 model light duty vehicle. Limits such tax credit to $70.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax credit and deduction for purchase by the taxpayer of a catalytic converter a part of a new 1975 model light duty vehicle.
